name: RunRagePlay. (EnixDev)
description:
HEY YOU,  Bored? Wanna Kill Time? Here Is A Game For You! 

With 10 Levels And Awesome Graphics You Can Have A Lot Of Fun!

  • Features-

~ Good Graphics That Run On Low End PC

~ 10 Levels With More Being Added!

~ In Active Development

~ Made By An Indie Game Developer <3

  • System Requirements

~ 50 mb space

~ 2gb ram

~ No Graphic Card Required!
